approveMangrove(address,uint256).notice: trader needs to approve Mangrove to let it perform outbound token transfer at the end of the `makerExecute` function

transferToken(address,address,uint256).notice: transfers token stored in `this` contract to some recipient address

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: withdraws ETH from the bounty vault of the Mangrove. NB: `Mangrove.fund` function need not be called by `this` so is not included here.
